name: The terrifying tale of everyday sacrifices
name_original: The terrifying tale of everyday sacrifices
description:
The terrifying tale of everyday sacrifices

Game made for https://itch.io/jam/pencil-chisel-code

Battle your inner & outer demons in this simple card game, but be wary - sometime some things need to be sacrificed to achieve victory.

How to play
  • Drag and drop cards on highlighted targets
  • To play cards, you need to have energy, which replenishes over time
  • You can see icons which represent actions that enemy are planning to do - "zzz"  isn't harmful, but axes on the other hand...
